description: ARC files are used for storing and recovering files in the event of accidental deletion or system failure. They may be backed up to an off-site location using Norton Online Backup.
NOTE: Norton 360 no longer supports ARC files.

common_filenames.description: Chunk0.arc - The name assigned to WWE 2K18 and 2K19's ARC files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .arc file in Webrecorder Player
images.caption: ARC file open in Webrecorder Player
